verses.text: Ach co Diosal, ak' a wach'k'olal t'ayonh. Ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayonh, ach tzalajocab' qued'oc
yic syojtaquejel masanil nación t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik tas snib'ej a k'ool yet' colnab'il tzak'a'.
Ach Dios, b'itanocab' junjun chonhab' t'ayach. Masanilocab' chonhab' sb'itan t'ayach.
Avajocab' junjun nación t'a tzalajk'olal, yujto tza ch'olb'itej yaj junjun chonhab' t'a stojolal. Ha ach ton tza cuchb'ej junjun nación t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ach Dios, b'itanocab' junjun chonhab' t'ayach. Masanilocab' chonhab' sb'itan t'ayach.
Axo lum lum, ol yak' sat avb'en t'a lu'um, ol yak' svach'k'olal Dios t'ayonh.
Yak'ocab' svach'k'olal Dios t'ayonh. Nivanocab' yelk'och Dios t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
